description: (Part 1 of 5)Imagine my surprise one evening as I'm strolling through town minding my own business when Kody pulls up next to my Corvette in his brand new small compact car and revs his engine and looks over and smiles at me. 'Wanna run 'em?', he says. I just laugh as the light changes and he takes off like a bat out of hell. I let him get a little ahead then I smoke him and slow down for him to catch up. He's still smiling and I notice how cute he is so I ask him to pull over I want to give him a business card. We pull over and I give him a card for 'Athletic Modeling' whatever in the hell that means.[continued in Kody: An American Soldier 2 (2)]
title: Kody: An American Soldier 2 (1), Scene #01
